General.Name: tmc Content Group AG
General.Description: tmc Content Group AG operates as a film license trading company in Germany and Austria. The company owns and licenses erotic film rights, as well as provides films through strategic alliances on the Internet with sales partners. It also organizes pay and free TV channels, and VoD and DVD/BluRay services. The company was formerly known as erotic media ag and changed its name to tmc Content Group AG in January 2008. The company was founded in 1935 and is based in Zug, Switzerland.
